body: I remember there being some include order problems that would otherwise force a huge amount of duplicated declarations. You can still just put Tensor::isVariable into `Type.h`, though. See if we do this or an equivalent for any other Tensor methods already.
body_html: I remember there being some include order problems that would otherwise force a huge amount of duplicated declarations. You can still just put Tensor::isVariable into Type.h, though. See if we do this or an equivalent for any other Tensor methods already.
body_text: I remember there being some include order problems that would otherwise force a huge amount of duplicated declarations. You can still just put Tensor::isVariable into Type.h, though. See if we do this or an equivalent for any other Tensor methods already.
